definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Zhiwu Chen, a professor of finance at Yale, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 耶魯大學的金融學教授陳志武也贊同這一看法。

sentences.english: She graduated from Wellesley College and Yale Law School.
sentences.chinese: 她畢業於韋爾斯利學院和耶魯大學法學院。

sentences.english: Three will be graduates of Yale Law School.
sentences.chinese: 三名是耶魯大學法學院畢業生。

sentences.english: Yale University has contacted Mr. Schmidt concerning these rumors.
sentences.chinese: 耶魯大學就此謠言聯繫了斯密特先生。

sentences.english: Yale University Department of English and literature have been critical of the new school movement.
sentences.chinese: 耶魯大學的英文和文學系曾屬於新批判運動學派。

sentences.english: Is there any celebrity from Yale?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有來自耶魯大學的有名人士？
在CCL的收藏中，那是耶魯大學的高流通庫。

sentences.english: It was really easy for me to just say "Yes, definitely".
sentences.chinese: 我很容易地就下定了決心，“就是耶魯大學了”。

sentences.english: He was here at Yale as a visitor in the spring for many years.
sentences.chinese: 有很多年的春天他都在耶魯大學訪學。

sentences.english: She had turned seriously nasty over a handsome yale boy .
sentences.chinese: 她爲了一個漂亮的耶魯大學生真的大鬧了一場。

sentences.english: Goolsbee was Tobin’s research assistant at Yale.
sentences.chinese: 古爾斯比是託賓在耶魯大學的研究助理。

sentences.english: Yale University professor require all undergraduate courses are taught.
sentences.chinese: 耶魯大學要求所有的教授均講授本科課程。

sentences.english: But... because of Yale's generous financial aid package, I was able to come all the way here.
sentences.chinese: 多虧了耶魯大學豐厚的補助，我才能來到這兒上學。

sentences.english: Shelly Kagan For example,the belief that I'm Shelly Kagan, professor of philosophy at Yale University.
sentences.chinese: 比如說，我是，是耶魯大學哲學教授這個信念。

sentences.english: In the campus of Yale University , can you feel the nimbus of the Presidents of USA?
sentences.chinese: 在耶魯大學的校園中，你能吸點總統的靈氣嗎？

sentences.english: I would like to apply for admission to Yale University in order to study for obtaining a graduate degree in science.
sentences.chinese: 我十分想申請入耶魯大學學習以獲取理科研究生學位。

pinyin: Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2
Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: National Taiwan University/abbr. to 臺大|台大[Tai2 Da4]
University of California/abbr. for 加利福尼亞大學|加利福尼亚大学[Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2]
doctoral degree/PhD/same as Doctor of Philosophy 哲學博士學位|哲学博士学位
